title: CopyCat OCR Comparative Quality Demo
subtitle: Tables, graphs, styled typography, and real-world benchmark items

overviewParagraphs: This demo evaluates OCR quality across premium, standard, and basic profiles using CER/WER metrics.
The benchmark text is modeled after practical business documents with headings, line-item style content, totals, and free-form notes.

realWorldItems.sampleFields: Invoice number, buyer name, line items, totals
Address blocks, tracking IDs, postal codes
realWorldItems.challenge: Dense uppercase text and mixed alphanumerics

realWorldItems.sampleFields: SKU table, quantities, unit price, notes
realWorldItems.challenge: Table-like layouts and tight row spacing
